text:
dEqvEShu# ca savitaqrmAnu#ShEShu caq tvannOq atra# suvatAqdanA#gasaH || 
cOqdaqyiqtrI sUqnRutA#nAqM cEta#ntI sumatIqnAM | 
yaqj~jaM da#dhEq sara#svatI || 
pAvI#ravI kaqnyA# ciqtrAyuqH sara#svatI vIqrapa#tnIq dhiya#M dhAt | 
gnABiqracCi#dra(gm) SaraqNa(gm) saqjOShA# durAqdhar.Sha#M gRuNaqtE Sarma# ya(gm)sat || 
pUqShA gA anvE#tu naH pUqShA ra#kShaqtvarva#taH | 
pUqShA vAja(gm)# sanOtu naH || 
SuqkraM tE# aqnyadya#jaqtaM tE# aqnya - [  ] 44
